title: Gboard appears to be testing contextual text-based stickers
content:
Gboard appears to be testing contextual text-based stickers as an expansion of a similar emoji-based option already available on the popular first-party keyboard for Android.

The post Gboard appears to be testing contextual text-based stickers appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Gboard for Android appears to be testing contextual text-based stickers as an expansion of a similar emoji-based option already available.
